Jeff Rogers
Global English Campus, South Korea

I am very pleased to speak positively about the experience we have had with Avishek during the entire tenure of his time with us.

Two of the main strengths that Avishek has is his positive attitude and his superior communication skills, which are critical in development when abstract and sometimes unclear concepts are being converted to code. Avishek always clarifies through inquiry, by which process all members of the team benefit, as does the project as a whole.

Another quality that we value highly in Avishek, is his ability to work on a diverse team, and to not only do his part, but to perform professionally in such a way that other team members are supported. This is a quality of maturity that makes him stand out as a valued operative.

Regarding Avishek’s coding skills, we can say much in praise. Frankly, a modern Fintech system is not a project for a novice. The systems are many and various, from social media support to accounting, tracking, productivity and payment systems… The list of complexity dimensions is pretty long. Avishek is at home with any difficult project we throw at him.
